alert.note: Alert for Aibonito; Coamo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 26 at 4:51PM ADT until August 26 at 7:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AST THIS EVENING FOR AIBONITO AND COAMO COUNTIES... At 351 PM AST, Recent USGS gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain continue across the warned area. Excessive runoff continue to affect Rio Coamo and its tributaries which is currently at minor flood stage of 10.0 feet. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. Excessive runoff from recent and expected rains SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Coamo, Aibonito, Los Llanos, Pastos, Mariano Colon and Palmarejo. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
